is.ru.tictactoe

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.ru.tictactoe.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class contains functions regarding the board in tictactoe. The class updates cells, check if cell is available and checks if there is a winner or tie

      default constructor initialize tictactoe board with size 3

      • hasWinner

        public boolean hasWinner()
        Returns:
        true/false if there is winner in the game

      • checkDiagonals

        public Board.Winner checkDiagonals()
        Returns:
        checks if there is winner in Diagonals. Returns WinnerX, WinnerO or NONE. If it returns for example WinnerX then X is the winner. If it return NONE there is no winner.

      • getWinner

        public Board.Winner getWinner(int numX,
                              int numO)
        Parameters:
        numX - if numX is 3 then X is the winner.
        numO - if it is 3 then o is the winner of the game
        Returns:
        returns the winnerX or winnerO if there is winner. If there is no winner it returns NONE

      • isDraw

        public boolean isDraw()
        Returns:
        true if there is no winner and letters in every cell

      • main

        public void main(java.lang.String[] args)
